name: arithmetic
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the part of mathematics that involves the adding and multiplying, etc. of numbers

example.eg: I've never been very good at arithmetic.

trans_examp.trans_en: calculations involving adding and multiplying, etc. numbers

example.eg: I did some quick mental arithmetic and decided it was going to cost too much.
example.egtrans: 我快速心算了一下，觉得费用会太高。

example.eg: I can't figure out which of these is cheaper - could you do the arithmetic?
example.egtrans: 我弄不清楚哪种便宜些，你能算一算吗？
